observation: Navigating to https://0xcoast.com/ returned status code 200

Coast - PulseChain Fiat On-Ramp  Skip to content Products Roadmap Markets News Log In Menu Your Money. Non-Custodial On-Ramp, Off-Ramp and Stablecoin for #PulseChain. CREATE AN ACCOUNT LEARN MORE Customers On Ramp Off Ramp Stablecoin Digital Accounts Native Bridge PulseChain's most trusted on-ramp Transparency Independently attested, live updated Proof of Reserves published monthly on #PulseChain Liquidity Plans to move billions of dollars monthly across more than 100 exchanges and OTC desks Collateral Every $CST is 100% collateralized, while customer FIAT deposits are held with our Trust Custodian at FDIC-insured partner banks. Redemption Near-instant mints and redemptions, powered by Trustless systems and Coast protocol Ubiquity Used by Pulsicans in over 100 countries while complying with all relevant regulations Adoption Trade currencies, mint crypto, pay invoices, buy goods, book travel, or trade NFTs with our partners Built For PulseChain Users Traders Traders rely on periods of de-risking to maintain portfolios. $CST provides traders a fiat-backed stablecoin for times when they don’t hold an active position. Investors Fiat-backed stablecoins make it easy for investors to move economic energy on chain. $CST gives PulseChain investors a bridge-free way to move capital. Developers Coast is designed to scale with the PulseChain ecosystem. We are creating a toolkit for other developers to build fiat onramps for their customers/users. Advocates Do you sing the virtues of $HEX and $PLS? The Coast onramp aims to make your life easier by providing a single point of entry and a referral program On-Boards Crypto is too complex for the vast majority of first-time users. The Coast dApp is built for on-boards with a simple interface and deliberately limited feature set.
